```{r}
df <- tibble::tibble(
  a = rnorm(10),
  b = rnorm(10),
  c = rnorm(10),
  d = rnorm(10))

normalize_df <- function(x){
 (x - min(x, na.rm = TRUE)) / 
  (max(x, na.rm = TRUE) - min(x, na.rm = TRUE)) 
}
  
  
```
```{r}

dfa <- normalize_df(df$a)
dfa

```
